comment.text: DNA ligase that seals nicks in double-stranded DNA during DNA replication, DNA recombination and DNA repair.
Belongs to the ATP-dependent DNA ligase family.

property.value: POLB-Dependent Long Patch Base Excision Repair
Early Phase of HIV Life Cycle
Processive synthesis on the C-strand of the telomere
PCNA-Dependent Long Patch Base Excision Repair
Gap-filling DNA repair synthesis and ligation in GG-NER
Gap-filling DNA repair synthesis and ligation in TC-NER
Processive synthesis on the lagging strand
P:Okazaki fragment processing involved in mitotic DNA replication

feature.description: In a colorectal cancer sample; somatic mutation; dbSNP:rs780748107.
Found in a patient with a syndrome of immunodeficiency and increased cellular sensitivity to DNA-damaging agents due to LIG1 deficiency; compound heterozygote carrying W-771; dbSNP:rs121434560.
